Upgrading 0.5, 0.5.1 -> 0.5.2

  1. Backup Database and all files
  2. unpack the phpaccounts.tgz archive
  3. copy old users directory to the new folder created
  4. copy old config.php file to the new folder created
  5. run this upgrade.php script
